solution_line_template: After Steve eats a bag, there are {total_macaroons}-{macaroons_per_bag} = <<{total_macaroons}-{macaroons_per_bag}={remaining_macaroons}>>{remaining_macaroons} macaroons left
The total weight is therefore {remaining_macaroons} * {weight_per_macaroon} = <<{remaining_macaroons}*{weight_per_macaroon}={total_weight}>>{total_weight} ounces.
